title: Bring your emails to life with GIFs
description:
A picture is worth a thousand words, but an animated GIF is worth ten thousand. Today, we’re proud to announce a new 3rd-party app to effortlessly insert animated GIFs into your email: Giphy.

Continue reading

title: Faster OCaml to C calls
description: The official OCaml documentation “Interfacing C with OCaml” doesn’t document some interesting performance features.
